actions

Class PPPencilAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • actions.AbstractPPToolAction
        • actions.PPPencilAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action

    public class PPPencilAction
extends AbstractPPToolAction
    A custom JPanel for PowerPaint that is used for drawing.
    Version:
    30 October 2014
    Author:
    Jonathan Hughes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent theEvent)
      Fires the property change "tool" with this tool as the new value and the property change "join" with the BasicStroke.JOIN_BEVEL property to change the join property when drawing with a pencil to even out pointy edges.
      java.awt.Shape mouseDragged(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Returns the Shape that is created from the given coordinates when the mouse is dragged.
      java.awt.Shape mousePressed(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Returns the Shape that is created from the given coordinates when the mouse is pressed.
      java.awt.Shape mouseReleased(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Returns the Shape that is created from the given coordinates when the mouse is released.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent theEvent)
        Fires the property change "tool" with this tool as the new value and the property change "join" with the BasicStroke.JOIN_BEVEL property to change the join property when drawing with a pencil to even out pointy edges.
